line_1: Guard from rapacious worms its tender shoots,
line_2: And drive the mining beetle from its roots;

line_1: — And, where yon oak extends his dusky shoots
line_2: Wide o'er the rill, that bubbles from his roots;

line_1: Each tree as in its native forest shoots,
line_2: And blushing bends with Autumn's golden fruits.
